main event: A witness observed an unidentified object in the sky above Hilo, Hawaii, that was spinning and streaking with lights.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a house and was estimated to be 10 feet above the ocean.,The object disappeared suddenly, as if a switch was turned off.,The report details multiple possible explanations for the sighting, including a plastic bag balloon and plasma of ionized air.,The observation was made visually and with binoculars.,The sighting lasted approximately 1 minute.
witness description: Civilian tower operator and civilian weather observer, both with good reliability.
